name: 探灵笔记—小刚·灵调局学员装*粉色（附送29999灵币）
detailed_description:
Xiaogang Lingzhao Student Uniform Dress Package (with 29999 Lingjian) includes the permanent unlock of Xiaogang Lingzhao Student Uniform. 29999 Lingjian is presented with the DLC.
"It's hard to control one's own blood, and he's a heroic young man."
The uniform issued by male students when they first entered the "Spiritual Investigation Authority". Even if we seal the place of complaint deeply, we can make the spiritual Explorer handsome and elegant.
Style:
Top: Suit
Pants: Pants
Shoes: leather shoes
Others: Ties
